extension-point.name: Requirement Drop Restriction in target Models
Define creation of specific actions on requirement drop
enable to attach a topcased model to a requirement model
Provide ways to add Variables to the requirement naming pattern
Extension point to implement transformation from file to requirement
Extension point to implement the counting algorithm of requirements

algorithm.description: Provide a default algorithm for requirement counting : The index is stored on the root hierarchical element of the requirement model and is incremented when a current requirement is created
algorithm.name: Default Algorithm

algorithm.description: This algorithm is based on regular expressions. The index for a new current requirement is the (maximum number + step) of all the already created current requirements. With this algorithm, we recommend to use a naming pattern similar to E_{resource name}_{index}.
algorithm.name: Regex Algorithm
